description: '''Peter O'Grady''', better known as '''Joy Orbison''' or '''Joy O''', is an English electronic musician. His style is a coalescence of [[House music|house]], [[dubstep]], [[UK funky]], [[UK garage]] and [[oldschool jungle]]. O'Grady achieved underground success with his debut single "[[Hyph Mngo]]", released via [[Hotflush Recordings]] in September 2009. He is also known for his collaborations with Boddika.
